item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 14, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:

2. ZFS 2.3.0 released with ZFS raidz expansion (138 points | 55 comments)

14. The Sikh Practice of Langar, a Free Meal Where Everyone Is Equal (16 points | 9 comments)

24. Sonos CEO steps down after app update debacle (366 points | 401 comments)

26. Ships must practice celestial navigation (92 points | 98 comments)
